name: Interface LoaderDelegate
text:
This interface specifies the loading specific subset of
 ExecutionControl.  For use in encapsulating the
 ClassLoader implementation.

methods.method_sig:
void load (ExecutionControl.ClassBytecodes[] cbcs)
   throws ExecutionControl.ClassInstallException,
          ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException,
          ExecutionControl.EngineTerminationException

methods.description: Notify that classes have been redefined.
Adds the path to the execution class path.
Finds the class with the specified binary name.
